Name

Vix_GetErrorText

Description

const char *
Vix_GetErrorText(VixError err,
                 const char *locale);

Returns a human-readable string that describes the error.

Parameters

err
A Vix error code returned by any other Vix function.
locale
Must be NULL.

Return Value

A human-readable string that describes the error.

Remarks

  • This translates an error code, which is an enumerated type, to a user-readable string.
  • The returned string is a constant string. Do not try to free it by calling Vix_FreeBuffer().
  • The locale is not used, and must be NULL. Only U.S. English is supported in this release.

Requirements

vix.h, since VMware Server 1.0
